result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brandon Scott Wagener

records.addlTxt: Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: ***ALSO $2,500.00 CO-SIGNATURE BOND TO BE SIGNED BY JAMIE DOEBEREINER*** No contact with the victim L.S (person, property, residence or family). Make all court appearances on time. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit. Defendant is to be placed on HOUSE ARREST with GPS monitoring through Racine County Alternatives Program (717 Wisconsin Ave, Racine). Defendant MAY ONLY BE RELEASED to the supervision of RCAP.  Exceptions to house arrest are court, attorney and defendant's treatment appointments. Note: $120 advance fee for installment of the GPS must be paid prior to the release from jail.

8:39 AM Defendant Brandon Scott Wagener in court, in custody.  Attorney Elizabeth Martha Angove in court for Brandon Scott Wagener.  Prosecuting attorney Raymond Robert Rutz III in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue. 
Defense moves to modify bond to under $3,000 cash, defendant will be going into treatment through his probation officer.
State does not object if defendant is seeking treatment, however, requests GPS monitoring to be added to the bond.
BTC: Bond motion granted.  Cash bond amended to $3,000 cash, $2500 co-signature bond, co-signature by girlfriend Jamie Doebereiner, with GPS monitoring/House arrest exceptions are for court and treatment.  Must comply with all rules of treatment.
Status conference scheduled for December 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.
